column1: Two way player Nathan Knight dunks on Jarrett Allen with two hands despite getting blocked
[Highlight] Nathan Knight gets blocked by Jarrett Allen, still throws it down
[Highlight request] Brandon Goodwin between the legs dribble then drops it off for a Nathan Knight slam
[Highlight] Nathan Knight blocks the shot and runs the floor for a monster put-back jam to polish off Phoenix
[HIGHLIGHT] UDFA Rookie Nathan Knight gets the block and then slams it home
[Scotto] The Minnesota Timberwolves and Nathan Knight have agreed to a two-way contract, a league source told @hoopshype
Rookie Leandro Balmaro with a sweet pocket pass to Nathan Knight
